channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:52 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 09:52 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Follow further messages. #Zaporizhia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
